solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String removeDuplicateLetters(String s) {--newline--        int[] cnt = new int[26];--newline--        int pos = 0; // the position for the smallest s[i]--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) cnt[s.charAt(i) - 'a']++;--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {--newline--            if (s.charAt(i) < s.charAt(pos)) pos = i;--newline--            if (--cnt[s.charAt(i) - 'a'] == 0) break;--newline--        }--newline--        return s.length() == 0 ? "" : s.charAt(pos) + removeDuplicateLetters(s.substring(pos + 1).replaceAll("" + s.charAt(pos), ""));--newline--    }--newline--}
